title: Why supermassive black hole continues to belch matter years after chewing up a star
desc: A black hole at the centre of a galaxy 665 million light years away is continuing to emit a jet of matter six years after eating a star.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Ilia Malinin makes Olympic debut with solid short program

title: Renee Good's partner addresses Minneapolis immigration crackdown one month after killing
desc: A month after Renee Nicole Good was shot and killed by an immigration officer in Minneapolis, her partner spoke out on Saturday, condemning the federal government’s immigration crackdown that took Good's life and urging the city to remember those whose names are never known.

title: Gallant: Netanyahu is a 'liar' who undermined security chiefs, has built false narrative of Oct. 7
desc: Ex-defense minister joined by Lapid in upbraiding the PM for cherrypicked quotes, shirking accountability in his response to state comptroller's now-frozen Oct. 7 investigation

title: Justin Trudeau's ex-wife opens up about lonely 'uncoupled' Valentine's Day as former Canadian PM moves on with Katy Perry
desc: She complained that the heart-filled month of February 'can feel especially loud' for people experiencing 'midlife singlehood' but suggested that it should not be seen as a failure.

title: It is insincere to say prices have not reduced - Rosemond Obeng
desc: A presidential aide, Rosemond Obeng, has insisted that prices have indeed reduced, dismissing claims that the current inflation rate is merely symbolic.
